# Prenatal leave
(Source: [https://www.gov.uk/maternity-pay-leave/overview])

## Start Date
* Up to 11 weeks before due date
* Automatically if
	- Baby is born
	- Pregnancy-related illness up to 4-weeks before due date

## [Pay|https://www.gov.uk/maternity-pay-leave/pay]
Prenatal leave would be part of Statutory Maternity Pay:

* 90% of average weekly earnings for up to 6 weeks
* Â£139.58 or 90% of your average weekly earnings (whichever is lower) for the next 33 weeks
